name: mute8-dev
description: Do not publish | package.json for local development ony

scripts.build: concurrently -n mute8,react,plugins,solid "npm run build:mute8" "npm run build:mute8-react" "npm run build:mute8-plugins" "npm run build:mute8-solid"
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run publish:npm
scripts.publish:npm: npm publish ./packages/mute8 && npm publish ./packages/mute8-react && npm publish ./packages/mute8-plugins
scripts.publish:npm:test: npm publish ./packages/mute8 --dry-run && npm publish ./packages/mute8-react --dry-run && npm publish ./packages/mute8-plugins --dry-run
scripts.devtools:watch: cd devtools-client && concurrently -n build,host "npx tsup ./devtools-v1.ts --watch --minify --treeshake --format esm" "npx serve dist --cors -p 4040"

author: Paweł Jastrzębski
